role.argrole: thing arg0 doesn't do enough to maintain

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 然而)) (PP-PRP (P 由於) (IP (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 河川)) (VP (ADVP (AD 长期)) (VP (VV 整治不力)))) (PU 、) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 污染)) (VP (VA 严重))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 已)) (VP (VRD (VV 影响) (VV 到)) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (ADJP (JJ 大)) (NP-PN (NR 高雄)) (NP (NN 地区))) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 饮水) (NN 品质))))))
